Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ products
    + prevent_code_update_trigger (trigger)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER prevent_code_update_trigger
    AFTER UPDATE ON products
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION prevent_code_update();
